subsection.name: Description
subsection.p: Logging targets defines a named logging target for the kernel. The name of the target can be used within category directives. At this time logging targets types are limitewd to a file sink.

subsection.name: Sample XML
subsection.source:
<!-- Example of a kernel that creates a named logging target that logs to a file. -->
<logging target="kernel" priority="INFO" name="kernel"> <category name="/logger" priority="WARN"/> <target name="kernel"> <file location="logs/kernel.log" /> </target> </logging>
